availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of William Yates and Joseph Yates. Owned seven enslaved persons in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott, District 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott, District 1, p. 60.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Yates (October 18, 1800-December 18, 1887)," Memorial #59410575, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59410575 (accessed April 27, 2018).
